title: Homeopathy may be bunkum, but we won't change believers' minds by arguing with them
text:
Simon Stevens is a phlegmatic soul. You have to be if you run the NHS. But when it comes to homeopathy, even he loses his temper.

You can hear the exasperation in his latest missive – sent to the official regulator of medical associations – pleading with it not to re-accredit the Society of Homeopaths.

“Chancers”, “con” and “potentially dangerous”: Mr Stevens does not mince his words on the subject, particularly as homeopathy has become mixed up in the debate about whether vaccines cause autism.

I say “debate”. Of course it’s not a debate. There is no scientific evidence linking autism and vaccines, just as there is no evidence for homeopathy – which, in case you don’t know, involves diluting...
description: Simon Stevens is a phlegmatic soul.
